column4: LOL - HELP PLEASE - I accidently deleted the panel on the bottom....the one with like changing workspaces, etc. How do I get it back? I don't know how to change workspaces now!
Anyone else know how to get a panel at the bottom....
right click the top panel, click add panel.
How do I delete ONE THING from the panel?
fattay, strangely enough click "add to panel"
and then drag the item off your panel into the window fattay
How do I move things around on the panel? Right now everythings bunched up....and how come it doesnt show my open windows in this panel?
fattay, all the items you need are right there in the "add to panel" menu fattay
fattay, one item is "window list" try that one
yes windows list is what i wanted
How can I make the panel larger....without making the text larger etc. Like in Windows XP you can make it bigger but nothing else changes, not the size of the stuff on the panel.
